Scripts.OnLoad: this:SetFrameLevel(this:GetFrameLevel() + 3) this:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonDown", "RightButtonDown") if this:GetID() == 1 then MetaMapNotesPOIpartyTexture:SetTexture("Interface\\AddOns\\MetaMap\\POIIcons\\Iconparty") end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if (TitleWideEditBox:GetText() == "" or TitleWideEditBox:GetText() == nil) then MetaMapNotesButtonSaveNote:Disable() else MetaMapNotesButtonSaveNote:Enable() end
